Text:
There is a glitch on this - dirty disc error after opening burning church!!!
 Waiting to see if specific to Mongols release or all...
You've been warned!

I used Mongols version, my dash isn't updated and I had problems with the church. I tried skiping all the cutscenes, but it didn't work. Then i deleted all other TU's and left only TU 5, and skipped the cutscenes and it got trough that part :D
Only thing you need to do is to leave TU5 , and delete older, and skip cutscenes to church. And it works :D
